attributes.action: Ban Big Cat Cub Petting in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the British Government to impose a nationwide Ban on Big Cat Cub Petting, including all Big Cat species in UK Zoos, Parks, Sanctuaries and Habitats.

Cub Petting has NO conservation value whatsoever. Once a Cub has become accustomed to human contact, it can never be rehabilitated & introduced to the wild.

2013 saw two UK Zoo's closely linked with a South African Canned Hunting Farm - where Lions are bred for Canned Hunting, for "sport"

Article > http://focusingonwildlife.com/news/white-lion-breeding-at-uk-wildlife-parks-linked-to-canned-hunting/

Combating this cruel & barbaric industry from outside South Africa is a must, this will help drive down this industry's revenue, thus affecting the industry as a whole.

Please also read Patrick Barkham's Guardian article here > http://www.theguardian.com/environment/2013/jun/03/canned-hunting-lions-bred-slaughter

More on the Canned Hunting industry can be found at www.cannedlion.org & www.lionaid.org


Thank you!

rejection.details: This petition has been closed at the petitioners request
